title: Kamala Harris, Cardi B., Tyson Fight Moved, COVID-19 Vaccine and more.
itunes:title: Kamala Harris, Cardi B., Tyson Fight Moved, COVID-19 Vaccine and more.
description:
Good morning and welcome to the ride! History has been made and we have something to vote for. The Chief Love Officer has specific wisdom for a 25 year old married man on when to tell the truth. Kamala Harris makes history. Cardi B. defends her decision to put Kylie Jenner in the WAP video. Tyson VS Jones, Jr. has been moved to November. Does Russia have the world's first coronavirus vaccine or nah? Today in Closing Remarks, Big Dog reflects on a conference call that he had with other radio heavyweights and reinforced the importance of all of US going to the polls. Go check out vote411.org!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
